comment: Best channel everrrr!!

I just got my results back, and I got a B in biology, which I know isn't that good, but it's actually such a big improvement!! Before watching your videos, I used to be so clueless and get Cs and below on my mock tests, so you helped a lot! I did skip a page or two in the igcses, but thats because I didnt finish watching all your videos yet, so all the questions i wasnt able to answer were questions from videos i havent watched. Anyway, thanks a lot,  my teacher skipped a lot of topics that you covered so watching your videos also made me love biology even more!! Thanks and keep up the good work
Thank you

I cannot express my gratitude. You make a difference to many students lives, I hope you know that and I hope you understand that we NEED you and you make our lives better. You’re the reason someones gonna pass their exam more easily, we really appreciate your help! God bless you study buddy 🦋
This video significanlty helps me a lot for long to learn and arduous to understand topic. Thanks a million for this kind of helpful video!
thank you dear 🤍
Kaash time per parhliya hota
You're an angel 😭💐
Do we have to lable it in question paper.
I am giving o levels but these videos are so relevant, i had to pay for coachings if you didnt upload all these effective lectures. Go ahead we are with you. Love from Bangladesh💕
The best channel for igcse i ever saw
thank god I found your channel early❤

I just wanted to take a moment to express my gratitude to you for all the amazing biology lessons you have been providing. You have covered most of the chapters and it has been really helpful in my preparation for my upcoming exams next week. However, I was wondering if you could do us all a huge favor and upload the full syllabus before the exams. It would be a game-changer for me, and I'm sure for many others as well. Going through all the material again would definitely help us to feel more confident and prepared for the exam.
please upload the whole bio syllabus, this is very helpful
